headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields that you want to get. When not specified, all fields are returned by default. For allowed fields, see the fields under list in the response section.

parameters.name: exclude_field_types_in_response
parameters.description: The type of fields that you want to remove from the response. Allowed enum values: NULL_FIELD : Fields with null values.

parameters.name: filtering
parameters.description: Filter conditions. Set these conditions according to your requirements. If not set, all ad groups under the advertiser will be returned. The request can be filtered by:

parameters.name: campaign_ids
parameters.description: List of campaign IDs. Max size: 100.

parameters.name: campaign_system_origins
parameters.description: The origins (sources) of the campaigns that the ad groups belong to. Enum values: PROMOTE : The campaign is a Promote campaign created through the TikTok mobile App. TT_ADS_PLATFORM : The campaign is a non-Promote campaign created through the API or in TikTok Ads Manager. Default value: ["TT_ADS_PLATFORM"] . Only the following settings can be retrieved for a Promote ad group: advertiser_id campaign_id campaign_name adgroup_id adgroup_name create_time budget schedule_type schedule_start_time schedule_end_time operation_status secondary_status To learn more about the availability of and the supported filters for Promote ad groups, see Promote campaigns .

parameters.name: adgroup_ids
parameters.description: List of Ad group IDs. Max size: 100.

parameters.name: adgroup_name
parameters.description: Ad group name.

parameters.name: primary_status
parameters.description: Primary status. For enum values, see Enumeration - Primary Status . The default value is STATUS_NOT_DELETE , which returns ad groups in all statuses excluding STATUS_DELETE . If you want to get ad groups in all statuses including STATUS_DELETE , use STATUS_ALL instead.

parameters.name: secondary_status
parameters.description: Ad group secondary status. For enum values, see Enumeration - Ad Group Status - Secondary Status . Note : This field is not returned in the sandbox environment because the ad group is not actually delivered. See Supported secondary statuses for a primary status to learn about the valid values you can pass in via secondary_status for the primary status you specify.

parameters.name: objective_type
parameters.description: Advertising objective. For details, see Enumeration - Advertising Objective . Note : Whether you choose WEB_CONVERSIONS or CONVERSIONS as the objective filter, we will return data of both WEB_CONVERSIONS and CONVERSIONS .

parameters.name: buying_types
parameters.description: Filter by buying types. Enum values: AUCTION : Auction ads. RESERVATION_RF : Reservation Reach & Frequency ads and TikTok Pulse ads. RESERVATION_TOP_VIEW : Reservation TopView ads. Default value: ["AUCTION", "RESERVATION_RF"] . To learn more about the availability of TopView ads in the API, see TopView . Note : The enum value RESERVATION_TOP_VIEW cannot be combined with other values. To filter TopView ads, set this field to ["RESERVATION_TOP_VIEW"] .

parameters.name: optimization_goal
parameters.description: Optimization goal. Enum values: Enumeration - Optimization Goal .

parameters.name: promotion_type
parameters.description: The promotion type (optimization location) that you want to filter by. Enum values: APP : App. WEBSITE : Landing page. INSTANT_FORM : Instant Form. LEAD_GEN_CLICK_TO_TT_DIRECT_MESSAGE : TikTok direct message. LEAD_GEN_CLICK_TO_SOCIAL_MEDIA_APP_MESSAGE : Social media app. LEAD_GEN_CLICK_TO_CALL : Phone call. Note : This filter field is different from the promotion_type used for ad group creation, which is also returned in the response of this endpoint. promotion_type as filter is also supported in synchronous basic reports and synchronous DSA reports. See Appendix-Mapping between different promotion types to learn about how you can set this field to filter out certain promotion types that are used for ad group creation.

parameters.name: bid_strategy
parameters.description: Bidding strategy. Enum values: BID_STRATEGY_COST_CAP , BID_STRATEGY_BID_CAP , BID_STRATEGY_MAX_CONVERSION and BID_STRATEGY_LOWEST_COST

parameters.name: creative_material_mode
parameters.description: The strategy that your creatives will be delivered. Enum values: CUSTOM (custom), SMART_CREATIVE (Smart Creative).

parameters.name: billing_events
parameters.description: Events that you want to pay for. For enum values, see Enumeration - Billing Event .

parameters.name: creation_filter_start_time
parameters.description: Filter by lower range of ad group creation time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time zone). Ad groups created later than this time will be returned. Suggestion: A time range within 6 months is suggested when applying a creation time filter, to ensure that the success and speed of the task won't be affected.

parameters.name: creation_filter_end_time
parameters.description: Filter by higher range of ad group creation time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time zone). Ad groups created earlier than this time will be returned. Suggestion: A time range within 6 months is suggested when applying a creation time filter, to ensure that the success and speed of the task won't be affected.

parameters.name: split_test_enabled
parameters.description: Filter by whether split test has been enabled for the ad group or not. true : Only get ad groups with enabled split test, false : Only get disabled ad groups. Note : If you do not specify this field, you will get all ad groups.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Default value: 1. Value range: â‰¥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value is: 10. Value range: 1-1,000. Note : If you use the enum value RESERVATION_TOP_VIEW for the filter field buying_types , the maximum value you can specify for this field is 100.

examples.title: Get undeleted ad groups within your ad account
Get all ad groups within your ad account
Get ad groups within a specific campaign
Get ad groups created within a specific time range
